description: A Financial-Payment is a payment from government to a recipient

_88company.description: A company which is the subject of a statement

___identifier.description: An official identifier paired with a code for the issuer of the identifier, e.g sec/12345

___jurisdiction.description: The jurisdiction of the body that made the payment, eg. UK, France, Delaware, Manchester

___csv_line_number.description: If the source for the data is a CSV file, you can optionally include the line number of the CSV from which this data was retrieved

___currency.description: The currency of the payment (three letter symbol, e.g. USD, GBP, EUR)

___transaction_number.description: The unique identifier for the transaction, scoped to this bot

___more_details_url.description: A url from which more details can be seen (may be the same as the source_url)

___entity_uri.description: A unique URL (ideally a dereferencable URI) for the government entity

___payee_name.description: The name of the payee (the entity that received the money)

___description.description: The description of the transaction as given in the raw data

___entity_name.description: The name of the government entity that made the payment, e.g. Environment Agency

___department_name.description: The name of the government department which the entity belongs to (if relevant), e.g. Department of Health

___date.description: The date on which the payment was made

___expense_type.description: The type of expense -- can be either capital, revenue (i.e. current expenditure) or null

___source_jurisdiction.description: Jurisdiction of the source of the data
